cast.original_title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
cast.overview: A rogue band of resistance fighters unite for a mission to steal the Death Star plans and bring a new hope to the galaxy.
cast.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story

cast.overview: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people. As malevolent forces explode into conflict over the planet's exclusive supply of the most precious resource in existence-a commodity capable of unlocking humanity's greatest potential-only those who can conquer their fear will survive.
cast.title: Dune

details.biography:
From Wikipedia

Michael Nardone (born 3 March 1967) is a Scottish actor. He was raised in Ballingry, Fife and trained at Queen Margaret University in Edinburgh.

He starred as Mascius in the BBC/HBO/RAI TV series Rome and appeared as DCI Richard Whiteside in BBC Scotland drama River City.
details.name: Michael Nardone
